pullRequest.title: Flag for filtering small SV equipment
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds a flag to MiscType that is used for flagging equipment as illegal to small support vehicles. This comes from the following rule clarification:
https://bg.battletech.com/forums/techmanual/answered-small-support-vehicles-and-special-equipment/
Basically anything on the heavy equipment tables in TM is forbidden, as is any C3 equipment or anything that has a  damage value in the other books. I also tagged equipment that small support vehicles cannot use for indirect reasons, namely Artemis, PPC capacitors, etc. (because they can't use the equipment it modifies). This helps MML filter the equipment list.

commit.message: Added MiscType.F_HEAVY_EQUIPMENT for equipment not valid for small SVs.
